tool_description: Imports multiple products from CSV files or data arrays with validation, error handling, and progress tracking for large catalog operations.

data_source.description: Data source type: CSV_FILE or ARRAY

file_path.description: Path to CSV file (required if data_source is CSV_FILE)

product_names.description: Array of product names (required if data_source is ARRAY)

brands.description: Array of brand names corresponding to product names

categories.description: Array of category names corresponding to products

prices.description: Array of product prices as numbers

validate_before_import.description: Whether to validate all data before importing

skip_duplicates.description: Whether to skip products that already exist

batch_size.description: Number of products to process in each batch (1-1000)

generate_skus.description: Whether to automatically generate SKUs for imported products

error_messages: Invalid data source: Data source must be CSV_FILE or ARRAY.
Missing file path: File path is required when data_source is CSV_FILE.
File not found: The specified CSV file does not exist or is not accessible.
Missing array data: Product names and brands arrays are required when data_source is ARRAY.
Mismatched array lengths: All provided arrays must have the same length.
Invalid batch size: Batch size must be between 1 and 1000.
CSV format error: CSV file has invalid format or missing required columns.
usage: Set data_source to CSV_FILE and provide file_path, or set to ARRAY and provide product_names, brands, and optional categories/prices arrays. Configure validation, duplicate handling, and batch processing options as needed.

failed_imports.description: Number of products that failed to import

error_details.description: Array of detailed error messages for failed imports
